title: Notepad
description: • Keep it simpleCreate a note in one click, it will automatically be saved on your device.Access all your notes at one glance.Archive or delete notes when you are done with it.• Make it personalChange the color of notes to highlight what matters.Sort notes by date created, date modified or by color.• Google accountSign in with your Google account to sync your notes.• Android WearAccess all your notes from your wearable.• Other featuresAdd reminders and receive notifications.Add widget to home screen.Share notes with other apps.Open a link directly from a note.• FreeThis app is free and contains no advertising.If you like it, please take a moment to rate it.
descriptionHTML:
• Keep it simple

Create a note in one click, it will automatically be saved on your device.
Access all your notes at one glance.
Archive or delete notes when you are done with it.

• Make it personal

Change the color of notes to highlight what matters.
Sort notes by date created, date modified or by color.

• Google account

Sign in with your Google account to sync your notes.

• Android Wear

Access all your notes from your wearable.

• Other features

Add reminders and receive notifications.
Add widget to home screen.
Share notes with other apps.
Open a link directly from a note.

• Free

This app is free and contains no advertising.
If you like it, please take a moment to rate it.
comments: Great simple barebones notepad app! Im very happy with it's layout and function. Clean interface. No advertisements is always appreciated for small apps like this. The only suggestion I would have is the option to disable syncing with google, I would like to use the app strictly offline and privately without having to share my data with my gmail.
nice and easy have to use
Seemed like a good App but upon opening it on another device and linking my Google Account, none of my notes were showing. Doesn't appear to be syncing and I can't find an option to manually do so.
The app first worked good but now it doesnt get snyc with the phone
I can't download this .... it show downloading pending since an hour.
recentChanges: • Distributed app to Android Wear watches
• Added a navigation drawer on the watch
• Improved connection failures resolution on the watch
